fack: v4l2src device="/dev/video2" ! videoconvert ! v4l2h264enc extra-controls="controls,video_bitrate=20000000,video_bitrate_mode=1" ! 'video/x-h264,level=(string)4.2' ! h264parse ! matroskamux ! filesink location="{save_path}/shitter2.mp4"
v4l2src device="/dev/video2" ! videoconvert ! x264enc speed-preset=superfast ! matroskamux ! filesink location="{save_path}/shitter2.mp4"
